title: Eyebrow trimmer, Painless Eyebrow Hair Remover, Hair Removal for Women, Protable Brows Hair Remover (Silver)
features: ♥ PREMIUM QUALITY AND BEAUTIFUL DESIGN-With 18K Gold Plated head. A Perfect Gift for Girlfriend, Mother, Birthday, Mothers day, Christmas.

♥ PAINLESS & EFFECTIVE- This eyebrow trimmer is an everyday maintenance clean up tool to be used in between your regular eyebrow wax or threading appointment. No More Tweezers! The precision head is to be used on the top and bottom of brows and in between eyebrows, to instantly and painlessly erase unwanted and stray eyebrow hair, without the pain of plucking!

♥ PROTABLE & EASY TO OPERATE- Exquisite compact appearance, easy to carry as your lipstick. Precision head tip helps remove unwanted hairs and maintain eyebrows. Target the smallest areas to maintain those perfect eyebrows.
♥ PACKAGE LISTING: 1 *eyebrow trimme, 1 user book. Note: 1* AA battery NOT included.

♥ WARM TIPS- Battery no Including in Package. For optimal results, eyebrow trimmer should be used on clean, dry skin free of makeup or cream. Pull skin tight and move the unit in small, circular motions.
description: Are you still troubled with maintaining perfect eyebrow? Choose the Spewom eyebrow trimmer, It will maintaining perfect your eyebrows easier than ever!

Why Choose Us?   Perfect Female Eyebrow Hair Remover Device  This eyebrow remover is an everyday maintenance clean up tool to be used in between your regular eyebrow wax or threading appointment   No Pains or Tweezers  The eyebrow trimmer precision tip helps remove unwanted hairs on the top and bottom of brows and in between eyebrows instantly and painlessly, no worry to get pains   Stylish Lipstick Shape  This eyebrow removal pencil has a fashion appearance and lightweight, very easy to carry in your bag, so you can maintain your eyebrow anytime, everywhere   Multifunction Use  This eyebrow hair remover epilator can be used not only for your eyebrow, but also can be used for your face, lip, chin, nose and so on   Install Battery to Use  This electric eyebrow razor needs to install a 1*AAA battery (NOT INCLUDED), so that you can use it even when you travel   NOTICE:  For optimal results, eyebrows should be used on clean and dry skin that is free of makeup or any creams or lotions. Pull skin tight and move the unit in small, circular motions
